article_title: Rite Aid Shareholders OK Walgreen Deal As CVS Melds Target Pharmacies

article_metadata.description: Rite Aid shareholders this morning overwhelmingly approved the company’s $9 billion sale to Walgreens Boots Alliance, setting the stage for a coming divestiture of hundreds of drugstores amid unprecedented consolidation in the U.S. pharmacy industry. Shortly after the deal was announced last fall, Walgreens disclosed that its contract with Rite Aid [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
